subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Ahhh the infamous Fish!
author: black bear hollow
full_text:
I feel we are all "one mind". We're all very capable of experiencing  
anything. Our beliefs/thoughts are what tend to limit us - in my  
experience. Some are more "natural" with sensitivity than others as we  
all have our special talents and gifts.

w.
On Aug 17, 2008, at 8:46 PM, threadsintyme@... wrote:

> w.,
>
> Amen to your comment! Psi sensitives can run in families and even  
> has been known to jump generations. The bottom line is that everyone  
> is psychic. To some degree, that is. Some more than others.
>
> Al
>
